*div1 type="summary"* *p*Seth Ingram to Austin, January 8, 1831. Reasons why his land grant should be augmented.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Austin*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="01-08-1831">Jan. 8, 1831*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Sir,*/p*
*p*Your seeming unwillingness to converse on the subject I named to you this *date_mentioned n="01-08-1831">morning*/date_mentioned*, prevented my saying to you all I had intended on the subject of my petition to *person_mentioned*Govt */person_mentioned*for an augmentation of *location_mentioned*land*/location_mentioned*. My reasons for my intended petition is not a mere idle whim, it is because I was amongst the first who emigrated to the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, It will shortly be eight years since I made the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*my home. At that time, and nearly ever since, I have been engaged in a business, altogether profitable to the *location_mentioned*community*/location_mentioned*, and for many reasons well known to yourself, it has been quite the contrary to myself. I lost all my property that was of value to me at my first landing, to the amt. of upwards of $500.*/p*
*p*The business I have followed could not be profitable to me, until the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*should flourish, in consequence of which my last seven years has been spent in a labour, that is hard and rough, living in the woods, during all of which time, I have been saving and economical, and at this moment find myself not only poor, but largely in debt.*/p*
*p*I have therefore thought, that as the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*has been proffitted by the business I have followed, and has been of public utility, that it might entitle me to a claim on the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, for a remuneration of the losses I have sustained in her services. I wish no extra acquisition of *location_mentioned*lands */location_mentioned*unless I merit them, and whether I do or not, depends on the reasons above stated, all of which, comes within your knowledge*/p*.
*p**person_mentioned*Seth Ingram */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
